content: learn to crochet this strawberry amigurumi with this free and easy pattern this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed in just a few hours use any yarn you like create a small keychain sized strawberry with sport weight cotton yarn or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable fruit amigurumi plushie keychain link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-strawberry-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/e88cltovjm0
